data.title: james tien Archives
data.text:
"Didn't you know that the famous Crimson Charm Gang is coming after your teacher?"

"The manual is our school's top treasure. We can't give it up."

Jackie Chan's first directorial effort showing the journey of a young man from immaturity to skilled, mature fighter.

"Little minx, let's fight"

A martial arts-feature about a young man fighting for his rights and those of his fellow workers against a criminal factory owner.
